attributes.action: Young Parliament Set Up To Advise MPs On Future Generation
attributes.additional_details:
<--The Problem-->
MPs and government bodies don't fully understand the increasingly changing young generations of England. Statistics and data can be very misinterpreted and money spent in areas which wont challenge the problems young people face.

A set of young people from diverse communities need to deliver ideas and create action plans to tackle the rise in drugs, drink and underage sex.

Only people from such generations, in areas where this takes place can fully understand where society is failing.

<--The Solution-->
The petition involves setting up quarterly meetings with people from around all areas of the UK, and then sending its findings to the government to discuss.
